course_title: Special Topics in Ethics and Society: Ethics, Theology, & Addiction
class_notes: (ON CAMPUS) ((Addiction is a pressing problem for the church in North America.   Given the staggering number of people who suffer from substance abuse disorders, and the daily news about the opioid crisis, this course seeks to equip students to helpfully engage those struggling with addiction. Using methods from practical theology and Christian ethics, we will critically engage theological questions and claims surrounding addiction by prioritizing the experiences and needs of those struggling with addiction.)
